text_1_facilitator.eng: When we feel stressed or overwhelmed, it can be difficult to look after ourselves, and our children.

rows.text_1_facilitator: When we feel stressed or overwhelmed, it can be difficult to look after ourselves, and our children.

text_1_facilitator.eng: That’s why every ParentApp module starts with a “Relax” activity to help you slow down and take a moment for yourself.

rows.text_1_facilitator: That’s why every ParentApp module starts with a “Relax” activity to help you slow down and take a moment for yourself.

transcript.eng:
Close your eyes. 

Use the magic power of three to stay connected and relax.

Breathe in to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe out to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe in to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe out to the count of three. 1, 2, 3.

Do you feel any different? Deep breathing helps our whole body and mind to calm down. 

Well done on taking a pause.

rows.title: Breathe to Three
rows.transcript:
Close your eyes. 

Use the magic power of three to stay connected and relax.

Breathe in to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe out to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe in to the count of three. 1, 2, 3. 
Breathe out to the count of three. 1, 2, 3.

Do you feel any different? Deep breathing helps our whole body and mind to calm down. 

Well done on taking a pause.
